trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_SEQ_00<tab>An undisciplined unit is a unit ripe for destruction, as Ser Marielle knows.

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_SEQ_01<tab>The men and women of Camp Cloudtop have grown complacent, Ser Marielle says, as the camp has developed a reputation as a backwater of no significance in the war with Dravania. The knight cannot abide this state of affairs, and has asked you to stoke the fighting spirits of her sentries─/psych them up, in her own words.

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_SEQ_02<tab>Your wild gesticulations elicit a variety of responses from the sentries, one of whom is Lord Emmanellain. Ser Marielle will doubtless find the young lord's reaction the most interesting of all.

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_SEQ_03<tab>According to Ser Marielle, there has been a noticeable change in the sentries' behavior, which she ascribes to your efforts. But when you tell her of Lord Emmanellain's sudden desire for more demanding work, she can only chuckle nervously at the thought of what is to come.
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_TODO_00<tab>Find sentries and /psych them up.
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_TODO_01<tab>Report to Marielle.

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_MARIELLE_000_000<tab>Excepting your recent clashes with the Vanu, it cannot have escaped your notice that things here are rather peaceful─to the detriment of our garrison's discipline.

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_MARIELLE_000_001<tab>Despite being built as an observation post, we have yet to record a single intrusion by the Horde. That is why, as far as everyone is concerned, Camp Cloudtop is a backwater of no significance.

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_MARIELLE_000_002<tab>And of course, the pride of our camp, the vaunted <var 1A 02 /var>Protector<var 1A 01 /var>, is in a perpetual state of needing repairs, so even were the Holy See to come under Dravanian attack, we would be unable to fly to their aid.

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_MARIELLE_000_003<tab>Simply put, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, this is where ambition comes to die. If you haven't aspirations for advancement, you'll be right at home.

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_MARIELLE_000_004<tab>However, I would like to think that enthusiasm can be just as contagious as apathy. If you'll indulge me, I would have you seek out the sentries and stoke their fighting spirit─<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> them up, you might say.
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_MARIELLE_000_005<tab>Try to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> them up, as you might say. That should serve to liven their spirits.
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_KIGHTA01593_000_010<tab>Wh-What!? What is it!? Is it the Horde!? ...By the Fury, what ever possessed you to do that?
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_KIGHTA01593_000_011<tab>I'm awake, I'm awake, worry not. After the shock you just gave me, I doubt I'll sleep for a fortnight!
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_KIGHTA01593_000_012<tab>Mmm... Is there anything fluffier than a cloud...?
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_KIGHTA01593_000_013<tab>Mmm... If there is, I don't want to know about it...
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_KIGHTB01593_000_020<tab>Ye gods, where did that come from?

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_KIGHTB01593_000_021<tab>Fine, if you insist, I will make an effort to be more alert. But really, I fail to see the point! We're hundreds of malms away from the front lines─which is just the way I like it, thank you very much!
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_KIGHTB01593_000_022<tab>You're looking rather grim. Why so serious? The Vanu are no real threat, and the Dravanians couldn't give a fig about us.
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_KIGHTB01593_000_023<tab>...Aren't you an odd <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((fellow)) /var>. Don't you have somewhere to be?
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_EMMANELLAIN_000_030<tab>I-Is it an attack!? What should we do!? What should we do!?

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_EMMANELLAIN_000_031<tab>...You had me fooled there for a moment, old <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((boy)) /var>! An amusing jest─albeit a tad cruel. Surely you must realize how unsuited I am to the monotony of mere sentry duty─yet still you tempt me with the promise of excitement!
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_EMMANELLAIN_000_032<tab>No, this won't do. This won't do at all. Lady Laniaitte <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> give me a grand mission as befits my station!

TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_EMMANELLAIN_000_033<tab><yawn> Hello there, old <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((boy)) /var>. Slain any Vanu champions yet? No? Oh, well, let me know when you have so I can make myself presentable for...for the... <snore>
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_EMMANELLAIN_000_034<tab>Is this what you do for fun? Or is it some esoteric form of training? Well then, carry on, carry on.
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_HONOROIT_000_035<tab>As you wish, my lord. Should I spy an outflyer, I will alert you immediately...
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_MARIELLE_000_040<tab>Many thanks, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Already I can see a change in our sentries' behavior.
TEXT_HEAVNA114_01593_MARIELLE_000_041<tab>Beg your pardon... Lord Emmanellain said what? Hah, well... I have no doubt that Lady Laniaitte will do her utmost to oblige him.
